Очень хорошая игра. Вместе с DLC прошел за 23 часа неспешной игры. Хорошая, добротная графика. Интереный сюжет. Конечно, в нем есть некоторые нестыковки, но учитывая то, что это фантастика, то можно простить некоторые огрехи. Музыкальное сопровождение так же на высоте. Не напрягает и не вгоняет в тоску. Никаикх сбоев или зависаний. Добротный, шутер с годным сюжетом.

怎么说呢。 这款游戏还是不错的。 有不错的剧情， 游戏难度也不太大。 
但是， 我觉有还有几个问题：
1、镜头太晃了， 玩一会就头晕。 
2、情景设置太黑暗了。 害怕恐怖的别玩。 我是硬着头皮玩下去的。
Absolutely a masterpiece. The first time I cried at the end of a game. Great job, Irrational Games and 2K Games! ♥

A colorful fantasy world of alternative history... but the game play is primitive. To be honest Bioshock Infinite is very limited in actions you can perform. You just shoot and run. No stealth no puzzles no nothing. There is a primitive magic style system of vigors but it is not important for the gameplay. You will be playing in visual novel with frequent shooter episodes. The game will ask you to choose between shooting and not shooting, but in reality the answer will be the same - you will  shoot em all again and again. Nice story by the way, but I don't like it. I'm more Deus ex kind of guys.

Биошок хорош, но не для меня. Не люблю шутеры...
8 Элизабет из 10
完美的艺术品，完美的剧情，每一次游玩都有不同的感受，很棒，很有诚意~
My favourite of the BioShocks. What a stunner. Great plot, great voice acting, great mechanics... definitely recommended.

Great game! If you like games that you can't help but be immersed in, this is it. One thing you will not be able to resist is falling in love with Elizabeth, the main character after DeWitt. The story revolves around you "DeWitt" and "Elizabeth." That is what makes it so immersive aside from the aweome plot and rich story. You will feel for Elizabeth, you will want to protect her, you WILL love her all the way through the game. The sad moments will be very sad.. But the "don't mess with Elizabeth!" moments when you take aim to an enemy's face and shoot it up are pure awesome! It's the year 2017 now, but this game will be good until 2099. Worth the $$, wish there were more games to the series :/ One day... Enjoy!
Una obra de arte :´)
Innovative and incredible shooter which can blow your mind with seriously intense plot.
very good game  the ending was very clever

Just like any Bioshock gameplay, it runs really smooth and has a lot of nice weapons, plasmids, and to a nice addition, they added Elizabeth! I would have to say Elizabeth is a really great addition to the game because a wingman who can keep you alive with medkits, keep you stocked with ammo and salts and even open tears that help you out in the game. When I first realized the Elizabeth was such a great wingman, I immediately feel in love with her. She is the best [bold] FEMALE [/bold] wingman who actually does something for you. The story is still confusing and so is the ending. The ending was really confusing because [spoiler] I DON'T FUCKING KNOW! [/spoiler]. Still all of the Bioshock games are good and this one besides a city in the sea, there is a city in the sky. HEAVEN. When you do finish the game you unlock 1999 mode and that is a really fun and challenging for players looking for one.
Самая любимая игра в плане сюжета и его проработанности. Эта игра для вас, если вы любитель мультивселенных и утопичных американских реалий.
INCREÍBLE!!

Was kennzeichnet eigentlich einen FirstPersonShooter? Hier wird nicht nur geschossen. Hier wird nicht nur gesucht. Hier wird nicht nur versucht zu überleben. Genaugenommen wird all das kaum gemacht. Es wird hauptsächlich eine Geschichte erzählt. Die Umgebung ist nicht sonderlich herausfordernd, sondern eher gradlinig. Die Kämpfe sind nicht sonderlich herausfordernd, sondern einander eher sehr ähnlich. Viel Taktik ist nicht zu finden. Bleibt also die Geschichte. Diese ist allerdings dafür sehr beeindruckend. Ich schreibe ausdrücklich nicht, dass die Geschichte jedem gefällt oder gefallen sollte. Während des Spiels fühlt man sich eher wie ein Zuschauer, der nur die Anweisungen des Spiels ausführt. Wenn die Geschichte allerdings gefällt (und mir hat sie gefallen), dann ist das in Ordnung. Lehnt euch zurück und lasst euch die Geschichte erzählen.
Ya me lo e pasado, y e de decir que me a gustado mucho. Simplemente (esto es spoiler)... ESPECTACULAR.
Somewhat watered-down gameplay compared to the original Bioshock but has a great story.

Amazing and unique art direction with great thematic music to boot. Regardless of whether you like Shooter games or not, Bioshock Infinite is so much more than that and is definitely worth playing. A real masterpiece.
雖然劇情是走單一路線，但是卻讓人感受到內容的豐富。蠻推薦這遊戲的，因為最後的結局真的是出乎我意料之外，加上內容新穎，是一款值得推薦的遊戲。
best bioshock

Первое что скажу , игра 10/10 по моему скромному мнению , из минусов я могу выделить очень нудные перестрелки , они выматывают , но это того стоит , чтобы посмотреть катсцены , одну за другой , проникать в сюжет , в персонажей , истории и т.д.Естественно стоит купить DLC для этой игры , чтобы сюжет стал для вас полностью окончен . Это отличная игра , и всем всем советую в нее поиграть , и потратить свое время не босбя в дотке , кске пубге , или в КАРТОНКАХ.)

A personal favorite, Bioshock Infinite maintains strong gameplay, story elements, and writing. While not particularly deep, the story includes many interesting themes, making the player consider of the pros and cons of American idealism, segregation, evangelist beliefs, and the divide between low and high class social templates. This makes the story rather engaging, however when the game dives into strange and unrealistic quantum mechanics, it kills the immersion into the well constructed 1910's world. The gameplay never gets old, as the gunplay is quite polished, several tonics (essentially superpowers) scatter the world introducing a whole new side to combat, and the inclusion of skylines (hanging rails that you may jump onto during combat) all ensure a diverse combat experience that never grows stale. Elizabeth and Booker (the main characters) are very well written, and undergo plenty of character development as the the game goes on. This game is fantastic, and I reccomend anyone even partially interigued in this game to purchase it. I can assure it will not dissapoint.
Main character smacks the elevator buttons pretty bloody hard
My mind has been blown.

Amazing game by any standards. The environment is rich and emmersive, the plot is not predictable, the encouragment for exploring every nook and cranny is absorbing. This instantly goes on my list of must play recommendations. Even played in small increments it keeps bringing me back for one more event after another. The replayability I suspect will be great for those who don't find everything their first time through. Some of the best graphics and effects I've seen even though it is 3+ years old. More good news is it won't punish your PC unless you crank it to 4k (I do and it is worth it). I bought it during a sale with the season pass and recommend it on sale. Full price might be asking a bit for a 3 year old game. Despite that it has aged well and the $/per hour of enjoyment factor is great if not rushed.

Update 4/17/2017
About to play through the game again and get some achievements I missed. The game truely is an experience to play. Searching every inch of the environment for achievement items makes me appreciate the art style that much more. If you haven't played it add it to your must have list.

The most overrated gamne of all time. I've played it twice and it is just a mediocre shooter. I feel it has aged very poorly for only being 4 years old. Ken Levine's narritive is indulgent nonsense, that gets more stupid the more you think about it.  The "you're not allowed to die" checkpoint system (becasue the real checkpoints are BEFORE cutscences, and have gaps of up to an hour of playtime) almost made me quit the game. I do not care about this story, especially on the second playthrough, because  it's garbage. And when i die in the middle of a setpiece it feels extremely cheap to just get respawned right there, with essentially no penalty.(Cheap as in too easy). It's like the casual mode in recent Nintendo games, except you can't turn it off. You actually cannot lose at this game. Bioshock had a much better story, and Bioshock 2 had much better enemies and combat mechanics, especially the guns, they just feel better. Infinite has really good level design, I will give it that, and it's not a bad game overall, but I think it's the worst of the trilogy.

It does feel like the first Dishonored which is awesome and the story is superb.

Fantastic finish of the Bioshock Trilogy. Beautifully designed, filled with fantastic locations and characters and compelling story. Played it with all DLCs and I can recommend it to everyone who cares about great plot in video games.

Игра - шок. Старая, но шикарная. Отличная атмосфера, идеальный баланс между "смешно" и "страшно" и красивая Элизабет. Много загадок в сюжете и отличная система перков заставляют играть опять и опять. Но не хватает немного, ибо она несколько прямолинейна во время стычее с противниками. 9/10.

Играл на английском языке, но всё можно понять без полного знания.

Bioshock Infinite, the only game so far that I bought twice.
I can't say I regret it, no. Not at all. 
Albeit some flaws - the Fink part drags on a bit too long, most of the vigors seem to occupy the same niche what not what not - it's still a visual and emotional hitpiece. It's not [i]guaranteed[/i] to cause tears, but it's hard to go through this game without a tinge of emotion. Things will tug at your heart strings.

I really do like it. I really do.
Amazing!

Beautiful game amazing great loved it. But, I have to go the hipster way and say the original was better. Starting with gameplay. They added more weapons. Though you can only hold two at a time. The weapons were a lot of them copy and pasted, (at least that is how I feel) but one has more power but you can hold less ammo. I mean it does not feel that fun to try out new weapons that you get, like it does in bioshock. Also where this game in my opinion suffers the most in gameplay is their excuse for plasmids, vigors. They were fun to use but I end up not caring about 90% of them. Only really using one. Which I did that in the original but the original seemed to have more thought put into them. It seemed as the vigors were tacked on only so people do not rage at the creators for not having these. Though it is a great game. The story though, it was great but hard to make out. Just what the fuck was going throughout my head at the ending of the game. Just wtf. Also your escort. SHE DOES NOT SUCK!!!!!!! She gives you salt, (what you use to power your vigors) she gives you health packs, ammo, best of all, SHE CAN NOT DIE!!!!!!!!!!! FINALLY A GOOD ESCORT PARTNER!!!!!!! It feels more like she is escorting you. Though when you lose her as an escort you realize how much you need her and you really have to try and find her. It sometimes feels like she is escorting you most of the time. The place you go through. A giant beautiful flying city in the air. It was such a beautiful place with amazing graphics and great atmosphere. Also near the end they nailed the atmosphere perfectly to the point where I just could not help loving the game. Though the original was better in my opinion this game is amazing you should get it. Also if you have to choose between pistol or carbine, choose carbine.

Años después, me toca hacer un pequeño análisis complementario, relacionado con los dlcs... actualmente ya cualquier pc normal tira el juego en calidades gráficas dignas de forma sencilla, lo que es de agradecer, ya que en ellos se hace la última y gran visita a rapture, que no nos deja indiferente a ninguno... dándole, un final que ya les gustaría muchos juegos actuales tener... los últimos segundos, si has jugado el resto de la saga, son lo mejor que puede ofrecer este juego, con un final sublime... que pocos van a poner reproducir en el futuro...

A continuación, el análisis original:


Fantástico juego con una historia "cojonuda", evado sentimentalismos pero la historia está fenomenalmente estructurada, con algún que otro salto inesperado que te harán pensar en donde c*** estas.

Personalmente el sistema de combate me ha encantado, le puedes dar muchos enfoques distintos a la misma batalla, y sobretodo en eso depende la dificultad, pues mientras que en dificultad media puedes ir "a lo rambo" y amasacrar con la escopeta o las armas de área de efecto, en dificil necesitarás usar la cabeza, pues aunque tengas el escudo a tope desde mitad del juego... te lo destrozan de un par de impactos y si eso es así... en la dificultad máxima prefiero ni imaginarlo XD

juego con el que te quedas con ganas de más, su campaña dura unas 10/14h, cuando terminé dije: "¿ya?", y si, era ya.

Gran variedad de "poderes", pero principalmente con el rayo y el de dominar enemigos te puedes pasar el juego sin necesidad de usar ninguno más (lo digo por experiencia propia), además, los poderes más "molones" y que más juego podrian dar, se les son dados al personaje ya demasiado tarde. Al final te dan uno de los más útiles, y yo pensé: "para darmelo ahora, mejor ya ni me lo deis".

En el apartado gráfico es espectacular, incluso con mi patata lo he podido tirar a calidad media, y a no ser que seas uno de esos quisquillosos de la "master race" con ordenadores petadísimos y estés acostumbrado a tus "120 fps y 4K" (que al final el ojo humano ni lo alcanza), hasta en calidad mínima se ve geniial.

¿Conclusión?: 9.5/10

What starts off as a seeminly normal game very quickly turns into a "what the heck is going on?" game, in a good way. I finished it yesterday for the first time, and I'm STILL trying to figure out exactly what the heck happened at the end. Normally I'm no fan of paradoxes, but this one was masterfully done.
Ein echt guter Shooter und dazu eine der ausgefeilsten und interessantesten Stories die ein Shooter jemals gesehen hat. Absolutes Must have!
Mindfuck.exe

This is quite possibly one of the best examples of world building and plot development I have ever seen in a FPS.  The beautifully detailed world full of personality meshes perfectly with the story being told.  By far the best of the Bioshock games and probably one of the best first person shooters in a long long time.  Elements of steam punk, horror, sci fi and fantasy....giant robotic George Washington death machines!?  What more could you want?

Сюжет в игре отличный , на порядок запутанный . Но геймплей в игре заунывнее не куда .Плохая стрельба , кастомизация оружия , плазмиды тот еще бред (что с ними бегаешь , что без. Разницы никакой ). Атмосфера  ну еще что то вытягивает , но приедается быстро (но это всё дело вкуса )
Рекомендую только ради сюжета , в этой игре он сильный . Сразу даже не разберешься что к чему . Но если вы ярый фанат таких динамичных игр как DOOM , Titanfall и д.р то вам игра скорее не понравится из-за геймплея(сам прошёл игру на высокой сложности ----> не ощутил ) . А как мы знаем , имея отличный cюжет , но убогий геймлей , то большинство и трёх часов не просидит за игрой . А дела до сверхсюжета  им не будет .
ИТОГ :8 из 10 за сильный сюжет и атмосферу , остальные части у игры хромают.
Fun ame, lots of content, deep with plot, Amazing twist at the end. This is one amazing game that I'd really recommend to anyone.

Fantastisches Spiel. Wunderschöne Optik, spannende Geschichte, spielt sich spassig und frustfrei.
Die "Burial at the Sea"-DLCs schlagen die Brücke zu den Bioshock-Teilen und sind für Freunde der Story und solche die es werden wollen zu empfehlen.

[b]Status: Durchgespielt[/b]
Ambientação no melhor estilo steampunk, a história e o enredo do modo single player são fantásticos, Uma combinação bem envolvente! O melhor da trilogia!

放在库里很久了终于把主线通了，人设我非常喜欢，第一人称渣男视角，伊丽莎白也是比较符合东方审美，玩的过程中我做了件很蠢的事：我选的中等难度，战斗中几乎不使用小伊的裂痕，生怕对以后的剧情走向有负面影响（[spoiler]“就是能量守恒23333”[/spoiler]），其实没有影响的，大家放心用吧。平行世界可谓是大坑，加上我蹩脚的繁体认知能力，很多类似宗教的对话没有看懂，但是这并不影响整体的剧情体验，是一个玩到中期就会被吸引进去一口气玩结束的游戏。
这里挖坑补海葬测评~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
画质：画风是偏卡通的形象，所以把抗锯齿打开，这种画质近几年都不会觉得尴尬吧。
one of the greatest gaming experiences i've ever had.

生化奇兵无限是个去年难得在PC上有发售的年度游戏，其他的多数都是只在主机平台发售，它在metacritic上拿到了94/100的媒体评分，8.5/10的用户评分，可以说成绩非常好。Bioshock系列从第一代开始就是充满了人文情怀的FPS游戏，它并不以枪枪枪作为卖点，可以说FPS只是一种形式，要传达的东西是游戏本身。本作讲述一个time paradox类似的故事，网友们戏称为鬼父。故事剧情不能说不好，但是总觉得有很多未合上的链条，结局虽然看似美好，但是难免让玩家内心引起惆怅。其中有个很大的卖点就是伊丽莎白这个npc，融入了很多萌元素，又是战斗里的弹药箱/补血/补魔（咦）/atm，这个设计很新颖很讨喜。其实不过于挑剔的说，这部作品很好，但是与一代的内涵走向不同的是，本作主要集中在自我的救赎上，而一代则表现了对资本主义的控诉和反乌托邦情节。可以说本作人情味大于思想性，但其实对于哥伦比亚这座城市的描写还是不错的，虽然稍微有些短暂。

（评测于2014-01-16）
Ein Meisterwek

Однозначно нужно хотя бы раз пройти и желательно на средней или высокой сложности(иначе половина прелестей пропадет).

Плюсы.
глава "Море дверей", забавная парочка и "I`m sorry... - No, you`re not. But you`re about to be!" из первой части DLC.

Минусы.
Целиком игра мне не понравилась, но ради определенных моментов её перепроходил уже 2 раза. Во-первых сам экшен - он отвратителен. Не знаю кому как, но мне он сразу напомнил Resident Evil 4(ну разве что Элизабет не могут убить или уташить куда-нить). Те кто играл в RE4 знают, что радость от забитого ништяками инвентаря почти мгновенно сменяется осознанием того, что скоро все придется потратить, а вон тех пятерых зомби вообще ножом чикать придется. Здесь с этим еще хуже - патронов реально почти нигде нет, видов оружия вроде бы много, но кроме 2-3 остальное хлам (снайперская винтовка+магазинная винтовка или дробовик). Энергетики вроде бы должны помогать, но на деле толку с них немного(вороны и бронь): помочь - помогут, а вот спасти... Зачастую приходится вертеться минут по 5-10 с пустыми стволами пока тебе не подкинет оружие или соли Элизабет( как-то мне надоело ждать и вертеться и я забил пожарника и ракетчика крюком, в дальнейшем просто бежишь в кучу и вот у тебя по 3 обоймы на ствол) или таки удасться урвать с земли что-нибудь с патронами. В таких условиях вам реально пофиг на чувства девченки и вы 100% отпихнете ее от трупа чтобы его прошмонать. Да и вообще при виде трупов первая мысль - пусть у них в карманах будут патроны.
С точки зрения сюжета - кони, люди - все смешались. В середине просто невообразимая каша - в одиночку вы разнесете весь город, но отжать обратно дирижабль у Фицрой вам не судьба. Куча лишнего и не уместного мусора. Все что на прямую не связано с Элизабет - тяжелая нарколепсия и запущенный алкоголизм. Но стоит его терпеть только ради главы "Море дверей". Сюжетная составляющая -это по сути Singularity(пространственно-временной континуум,пс. боевка в сингулярити лучше) и Umineko no Naku Koro Ni(море дверей. Для тех кто в танке - есть результат, он один и другого быть не может. То как вы к этому результату пришли не важно - итог будет не изменнен, он не зависит от ваших эмоций его достижения). Помнится в первом биошоке было две концовки, во втором - три. Здесь между маяками можно гулять как хочешь - но покажут вам одно и тоже. В DLC с сюжетом еще хуже, и по сути он нужен, чтобы поставить жирнючий крест на продолжении(хотя кто его знает).
Великолепная игра с великолепной концовкой. Советую играть с русской озвучкой чтобы полностью проникнуться атмосферой происходящего

Dette spilet vari et breit spill å spille synts jig faktisk at eg likte
整体上有一点杂乱，制作组想表达的东西太多，但确实是一款有深度值得一玩的佳作。第一次玩的时候确实被震撼到了，特地补一下游戏钱。

Very solid shooter, with Bioshock's usual flourishes and excellent production. The cast is memorable and well-written. I won't say anything about the ending except that I liked it, some others didn't, and that was the point.

The Burial at Sea DLC is quite good too, but be forewarned - it's much more difficult than the main game.

Highly recommended.

Loved it from day one, its not everyday that you get to swing around a pole whilst becoming a maniac and spinning blades to rip peoples heads off. A different direction from the original games but incredible nevertheless.

I bought this game per recommendation from many friends and I frankly regret it, even at the sale price of $15.

The good:
-Graphics are really cool
-Game mechanics flow well
-Story is just okay (could be in "the bad")
-The powers you pick up and can use as weapons are pretty cool

The bad:
-Game crashes repeatedly when I try to open a gate which would lead me to the next part of the story.  Tried updating steam, restarting game, restarting computer, etc. and still doesn't work.  Steam rejected my request for a refund because I had over 2 hours logged on the game.  This is my main gripe for the negative review.
-Gameplay is pretty repetitive.  I felt as if I was running from A to B every 5 minutes, killing some people, looting for salts/money/health/ammo and then repeating.  Didn't have much fun playing this game and was very disappointed considering all the hype the game gets.

Would NOT recommend this game unless you have your bar set low for games.

ho appena finito di giocarlo... ho ancora i brividi per il suo gameplay, la sua storia e del finale che mi ha lasciato senza parole. 

punto 1: per capirlo devi esplorare a fondo tutta la mappa, i livelli, cercare e trovare tutti i segreti/risolvere indovinelli avvolte molto semplici. devi saper ascoltare ed essere particolarmente attento nello scorrere del gioco

punto 2: se lo giochi di fretta, senza esplorazione e lo giochi solo per sparare, non ti gusti la storia ma ti diverti da matti con tutti i poteri e le armi potenziabili che troverai nel corso del gameplay

punto 3: ti consiglio di giocarlo in modalità difficile. io lo ho giocato in difficoltà normale ma e troppo semplice dato che sono morto solo 1 volta per sbaglio ed era la prima volta che lo giocavo. quindi, non aver paura e giocalo in modalità difficile!

punto 4: anche se vecchio, il gioco e maledettamente fatto bene (non parlo dei nemici, quelli sono stupidi) l'ambiente e eccezionale, il gioco fa in modo che tu ti affezioni a dei personaggi (che non dirò chi sono perchè, hey! se lo vuoi scoprire giocalo! niente spoiler!) e ti innamori del campo di battaglia e di come appaiono tutte le location.

punto 5: il gioco cambia completamente mentre lo giochi. e come passare dal paradiso all'inferno o da una fetta di torta ad una fetta di schiaffi

consiglio il gioco? be... ma certo che si dannazione! 

non ti dico null'altro perchè devi godertelo affondo. ci sono tantissime cose che non ho scritto sul gioco e che sono cose bellissime/fighe
Buenísimo. Compralo YA.

controls dont feel good with a mouse/keyboard, but not unplayable by any means
couldn't get rid of sluggish mouse movement even with v-sync off
not as bad with a controller
turnspeed/sensitivity is lowered while sprinting, which just doesn't feel right when playing

Pros
-good visuals and artsyle
-guns sound cool and are fun to use
-powers i feel are even better than the first 2 games
-offers a benchmark tool for before you start the game which is greatly appreciated
Cons
-can't skip what are essentially cutscenes, and i don't really care about story
-for some reason last i remember the fov slider doesn't have numbers written on it, which just seems odd
-controls

controls dont feel good with a mouse/keyboard, but not unplayable by any means
couldn't get rid of a small amount of sluggish mouse movement even with v-sync off
better with a controller IMO
turnspeed/sensitivity is lowered while sprinting, which just doesn't feel right when playing

game is recommended if you want a visual showcase with decent gameplay, and engaging story for some people, but for pure fps funtime you might want to look elsewhere

Ho appena finito questo capolavoro e mi sento di dire fin da subito che è stata una delle storie più belle che un videogioco mi abbia mai raccontato. Mi sento quasi un vuoto dentro!
È davvero dura scegliere il migliore tra il primo capitolo e questo (il secondo, per quanto bello e più emozionante, non arriva agli stessi livelli degli altri due): tutti hanno un impatto visivo pazzesco, lo stile steampunk lo adoro troppo, le ambientazioni sono sensazionali, sia i fondali di Rapture sia i cieli di Columbia sono davvero affascinanti! La trama di entrambi è matura e molto bella, ma quella di Infinite in più, oltre ad essere di difficile comprensione (ma penso che nessuno l'abbia capita da solo; io la approfondirò appena possibile), si carica di concetti e significati filosofici che danno quel tocco di fascino in più che mi ha fatto molto piacere, i personaggi sono ben costruiti (ci si affeziona subito ad Elizabeth e ci si immedesima con facilità a DeWitt).
Il sistema di gioco è semplice ed efficace: riprende un po' quello di BioShock 2, che a sua volta migliorava quello di BioShock.
Le musiche e il sonoro in generale, inoltre, permettono di immergersi meglio nel gioco e sono piacevoli.

Non ho però scaricato i DLC, magari ci penserò non appena ci saranno nuovi sconti sul gioco (acquistai il Triple Pack il gennaio scorso a 10 euro).

Che altro dire? Questa opera d'arte (perchè si merita questa definizione) è sicuramente un gioco che consiglio a tutti. Giocatelo, non ve ne pentirete!
Игра которая смогла впечатлить своим трогательным сюжетом.
Данная игра очень захватывающая, эпичная с очень интересным сюжетом. Помимо главных заданий, есть и дополнительные. И что самое главное - на неё не требуется мощный ПК

Kann das Spiel nur bestens weiterempfehlen,für die jenigen die gerne Singelplayer spielen und nach einem mitreißendem Abenteuer suchen.
